title: Fix cross-mission deny rule poisoning from merged config cache
description: The merged config cache in merge.go keyed by (shadowCommitHash:modsHash) cached mission-specific deny entries. When mission A populated the cache, mission B got A's deny entries instead of its own, leaving B's claude-config unprotected. Fixed by removing the cache entirely.
close_reason: Fixed by removing the merged config cache entirely. The cache was keyed by (shadowCommitHash:modsHash) which is mission-agnostic, but it cached mission-specific deny entries. This caused mission B to inherit mission A's deny rules, leaving B's claude-config writable.
